title: We make TV and streaming discoverable and shareable.

page.home.title: Share and discover what’s on TV.
page.home.emphasize: Live TV is full of countless shareable moments that happen in the blink of an eye.
page.home.text: To capture and share these moments, you have two options; (1) a fortune teller knows exactly when to hit record; or (2) You have Snapscreen ready on your mobile phone so you never miss a moment. As soon as you witness a shareable moment, take a photo of the screen with Snapscreen and within seconds you'll have a high quality clip of that moment for you to share with your network.

page.vision.title: Our Vision
page.vision.headline: Making TV and streaming discoverable and shareable.
page.vision.emphasize: Sharing and discovering of TV or streaming moments should be easy, fun and free!
page.vision.text: We realized this to be a real need of people who share photos of TV screens and clunky recordings in social media. We give people a better experience and provide broadcasters new opportunities to interact with them.

page.solution.title: Our Solution
page.solution.headline: As a viewer I can share and discover moments of TV.
page.solution.emphasize: Have you ever tried sharing what's on TV?
page.solution.text: With Snapscreen you simply take a photo (Snapshot) of a TV or streaming with your mobile. Snapscreen detects instantly the specific moment of the programm. You can rewind in time, create a clip and share this in broadcast quality.

page.business.title: For Broadcasters of linear TV and streaming
page.business.headline: A new way to reach audience and create engagement.
page.business.emphasize: With Snapscreen broadcasters can embrace customer behavior and get a non-intrusive connection to their audience.
page.business.text: Savvy marketers can take advantage by engaging their audience in new and compelling ways. Analytics of usage and interests can be linked back to brand values and win over viewers loyality.

page.faq.title: Frequently asked questions.
page.faq.headline: There’s no such thing as a stupid question.
page.faq.emphasize: Snapscreen is a new and innovative.
page.faq.text: It is in our interest to help you understand our idea and what we provide. We also would like to get your feedback and hear your thoughts. Feel free to ask us anything you like to know.

page.contact.title: Get in touch
page.contact.headline: Your bright future starts with a simple conversation.
page.contact.emphasize: Whether you are curious how Snapscreen works with you,
page.contact.text: or you’d like to know your growth content potential, we’d love to chat with you.
